TitleSelect: Free Time and Hobbies: "20 Bộ câu hỏi & Trả lời | Exploring Free Time and Hobbies: How People Spend Their Leisure"
ListenList: Do you have enough free time?
Maria thinks she has enough free time to relax and enjoy her hobbies.
John feels he never has enough free time because of his busy schedule.
Anna believes she has a balanced amount of free time for both work and leisure.
Do you have free time on Sundays?
Maria always keeps Sundays free for family activities.
John usually works on Sundays but tries to find some free time.
Anna spends her Sundays doing hobbies and relaxing.
Do you have much free time during the day?
Maria has free time during the day as she works flexible hours.
John only has free time during lunch breaks at work.
Anna finds time during her breaks at school to relax.
Do you like to watch movies?
Maria loves watching movies, especially comedies.
John enjoys action movies but doesn't watch them often.
Anna prefers watching documentaries and drama films.
What are you doing this weekend?
Maria plans to visit a new restaurant with friends this weekend.
John is going on a hiking trip with his colleagues.
Anna is attending a music festival in the city.
What did you do last summer vacation?
Maria traveled to Italy for her summer vacation.
John stayed home and did some home improvement projects.
Anna volunteered at an animal shelter during her summer break.
What did you do last weekend?
Maria went to a beach party with her friends last weekend.
John attended a workshop on photography.
Anna spent the weekend reading and gardening.
What do you do in your free time?
Maria likes to paint and go for long walks in her free time.
John spends his free time playing video games and watching sports.
Anna enjoys cooking new recipes and practicing yoga.
What hobbies do you have?
Maria enjoys painting and hiking as her main hobbies.
John likes playing guitar and collecting stamps.
Anna's hobbies include cooking and gardening.
Where do you spend your free time?
Maria often spends her free time at parks and cafes.
John prefers to stay at home during his free time.
Anna likes to visit museums and libraries in her free time.
Who do you spend your free time with?
Maria spends her free time with her friends and family.
John enjoys spending his free time alone to relax.
Anna likes to hang out with her friends and sometimes with her family.
How do you like to spend your free time?
Maria likes going shopping and playing sports in her free time.
John enjoys reading and relaxing at home.
Anna prefers chatting with friends and going to the cinema.
If you had more free time, what would you do with it?
Maria would travel more if she had more free time.
John would learn a new language with extra free time.
Anna would start a new hobby like pottery if she had more free time.
Tell me about some good places to hang out. Why are they good?
Maria thinks parks are good places to hang out because they are relaxing.
John prefers cafes because they are quiet and comfortable.
Anna likes the beach because it’s fun and lively.
Where do young people in this country usually spend their free time?
Maria says young people in her country often go to malls.
John believes they spend their time at sports clubs.
Anna thinks they hang out at cafes and social clubs.
Would you like to have more free time? What would you like to give up so that you could have more free time?
Maria would give up some work hours to have more free time.
John would reduce his overtime work to gain more free time.
Anna would spend less time on social media to have more free time.
How do the women in your family usually spend their free time?
Maria says the women in her family like to cook and shop in their free time.
John notes that the women in his family enjoy reading and gardening.
Anna mentions that the women in her family spend time knitting and watching TV.
How do the men in your family usually spend their free time?
Maria says the men in her family enjoy watching sports and fishing.
John mentions that the men in his family like playing golf and fixing cars.
Anna says the men in her family spend their free time playing video games and doing DIY projects.
Do men and women spend their free time differently? How?
Maria believes men and women have different interests and activities in their free time.
John thinks there are some differences but also many shared activities.
Anna feels that men and women often have similar hobbies nowadays.
Do people's leisure time activities change as they get older? How?
Maria thinks people choose more relaxing activities as they get older.
John believes interests evolve with age and responsibilities.
Anna notes that older people might prefer quieter hobbies like reading or gardening.

seo.Topic: Exploring Free Time and Hobbies: How People Spend Their Leisure
seo.Title: Exploring Free Time and Hobbies: How People Spend Their Leisure
seo.metaTitle: Free Time and Hobbies: "20 Bộ câu hỏi & Trả lời | Exploring Free Time and Hobbies: How People Spend Their Leisure"
seo.metaDescription: Discover how people spend their leisure time and engage in hobbies, exploring cultural and personal perspectives.

contentArray.content: Exploring Free Time and Hobbies: How People Spend Their Leisure
Understanding how individuals allocate their free time reveals insights into personal interests and cultural influences.
From weekend activities to hobbies pursued during leisure hours, people's choices vary widely and reflect their lifestyles.
Explore different perspectives on leisure activities and the role of hobbies in maintaining work-life balance.
